info.name: Color Newtab
info.description:
Firefox 28 and below, higher version not supported.
rt
info.additionalInfo:
需开启九宫格
about:config下修改为true
browser.newtabpage.enabled    true

此样式默认
browser.newtabpage.columns  4
browser.newtabpage.rows     3
按需修改
